title: baristor
author: baristor
content: Hi Just looking to build some trust.If anyone can fill this let me know.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Since you already have negative trust on your profile, you really have nothing to lose. Your accountis useless anyway. On the flip side, the lender will end up losing $10 for nothing, as any trust coming from your account holds no value.If you want to build trust in the community, come up with some kind of collateral for your loans.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: baristor on July 06, 2023, 10:02:06 PMHi Just looking to build some trust.Seriously?  That justification is only likely to earn you more red-tags, not a loan.

comments.author: baristor
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 06, 2023, 11:31:39 PMQuote from: baristor on July 06, 2023, 10:02:06 PMHi Just looking to build some trust.Seriously?  That justification is only likely to earn you more red-tags, not a loan.What ? Not my fault any joker can leave a neg trust without any proof. Ok I will provide collateral in bnb.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: baristor on July 07, 2023, 07:11:46 AMQuote from: DireWolfM14 on July 06, 2023, 11:31:39 PMQuote from: baristor on July 06, 2023, 10:02:06 PMHi Just looking to build some trust.Seriously?  That justification is only likely to earn you more red-tags, not a loan.What ?It's a public secret that you don't talk about taking loans to gain trust. Many users have done it, but if you mention it, you risk a tag.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on July 07, 2023, 01:15:53 PMQuote from: baristor on July 07, 2023, 07:11:46 AMQuote from: DireWolfM14 on July 06, 2023, 11:31:39 PMQuote from: baristor on July 06, 2023, 10:02:06 PMHi Just looking to build some trust.Seriously?  That justification is only likely to earn you more red-tags, not a loan.What ?It's a public secret that you don't talk about taking loans to gain trust. Many users have done it, but if you mention it, you risk a tag.Getting a loan to build a trust to do what later? Scam and disappear? Why would someone lose money on loans interest to gain trust if they have no intention for something big later using this trust?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I doubt if you even need that loan. Perhaps you just came back to troll around and maybe hope you can catch a victim or two, since the amount you mentioned is small?Seem pretty clear that you can not be trusted even with $1.Old habits die hard. Can you tell us about this case?Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 15, 2019, 09:30:34 PMbaristor recently woke up after 14 months of inactivity, and is requesting a no-collateral loan (archive.)4 Accounts Connected:baristor,baristor137,finalelement,inhonorwetrust,Proof:Quote from: finalelement on June 22, 2014, 10:41:39 PMHi I'll be using this loan for cloud mining needed to purchase 1 GhS. Sorry no collateral its a small amount  so. I will repay as soon as I can Thanks 4 help btc address1CgJbhY3HojqHXYTmYkavME5oHhzm826mKhttp://archive.fo/WF8A9Quote from: baristor on January 11, 2015, 04:08:47 PMThats coz that is the casinobtc address : https://blockchain.info/address/1AXv2GqvrMpqcZLsNouJDPexsZfhibfkHT - mineBtw How do I sign and send a message ? I dont mind giving acct as collateral etc.http://archive.fo/eNpgAQuote from: baristor on February 22, 2015, 11:55:45 PMJoining as:Name: baristoractivity :112posts: 263rank : Memberwallet: 1CgJbhY3HojqHXYTmYkavME5oHhzm826mKhttp://archive.fo/dMaa8#selection-4969.8-4969.42Quote from: Vod on March 24, 2015, 06:57:48 PMQuote from: inhonorwetrust on March 24, 2015, 06:54:54 PMhi guys I am new on dis site, Need a small mini loan .005 btc, will repay u .0075 btc in a week!My add:1AXv2GqvrMpqcZLsNouJDPexsZfhibfkHTthanks!~Quote from: multicryptos on April 27, 2015, 11:28:40 AMQuote from: baristor137 on April 27, 2015, 09:18:08 AMI am still waiting payment my ID:Bewatermyfren   2672 0.0180 BTC 3 23/03 18:46:24 0.00000000 (0.00000000%) 0.0353 BTC x1.96 PAID! Says paid gives no details when where I havnt recvd any money. Multi cryptos scam ?In our records, your investment appear as paid, as well in our coinpayments account3/23/2015 06:46:24pm   0.03531038 BTC   Complete   Address: 1CgJbhY3HojqHXYTmYkavME5oHhzm826mKTX ID: c669f217be79caf2a84dc84417d5fbdec5ea0ed0fc9e2d74ef9d5fe245ca4ce3   I has been 1 month and we didnt' receive any complain from you, why now?Is this some strategy to lower MULTICRYPTOS reputation?http://archive.fo/Z3jLoRelated Addresses:Code:1Q3d14S1Vkhsta1t6VeJZFJaeDoEQSffct1AXv2GqvrMpqcZLsNouJDPexsZfhibfkHT1CMKQPZ41NbSYvMMysvQeATYnFoJ1vExTN1C5dbasP1hmgc1gu8Yy4HopesXUioANayr1CgJbhY3HojqHXYTmYkavME5oHhzm826mK1D6og9LRQHupYZPKNpnMR5VEMP2QBLoyx5Miscellaneous: This person appears to have used newbie accounts to apply for no-collateral loans.  It could be an account farmer using alts to borrow money he has no intention of repaying.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: baristor on July 08, 2023, 07:08:33 PMAnd if you actually check any loan that was given to me was repayed.The only loan I can find that you received was for $6, over 8 years ago.  Were there others?Quote from: jorjito25 on February 16, 2015, 10:50:31 PMQuote from: baristor on February 16, 2015, 10:47:24 PMloan amt .025repayment 15 daysrepay 0.0351CgJbhY3HojqHXYTmYkavME5oHhzm826mKAccepted! Sent! https://blockchain.info/es/address/1CgJbhY3HojqHXYTmYkavME5oHhzm826mKRepayment Address on topic. Thank you!Quote from: jorjito25 on May 04, 2015, 07:51:31 PMQuote from: baristor on May 04, 2015, 03:23:47 PMhi ! payment has been made.Received!  I bit late but still okThanks!!I found evidence that you might have borrowed BTC0.01 ($1.72 at the time) from two individuals back in January of 2015, but I didn't find evidence that you returned the money.Anyway, if you can sign a message using the address you used for the loan form jorjito25 (or one you posted in an unedited message previous to that,) I'll remove my redtag.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: baristor on July 08, 2023, 07:08:33 PM~And if you actually check any loan that was given to me was repayed.Can you please provide some proof of your previous loans that you have paid off as you claim?Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 08, 2023, 08:22:18 PM~Anyway, if you can sign a message using the address you used for the loan form jorjito25 (or one you posted in an unedited message previous to that,) I'll remove my redtag.Hahaha! That is a good one! I am absolutely positive that he will be able to do that.
